entry.summary:
Vendor: KRUGER
Type: Facial Tissue
Price: 35.00

8 thin packets of 10 tissues. 12 bags of 8 packets per case.

The Scotties you know and love, now available when away from home.

  • Premium quality 3-ply, full-size facial tissues in a thin, self-sealing package
  • Plastic slim packs offer hygienic format, keeping tissues clean and dry.
  • Low sheet count per slim pack offers convenience and a “personalized tissue" experience.
  • Ideal for use in: hotel guest rooms, acute and long term health care, cash & carry, convenience/gas, online catalogue retailers.
Ply  3
Colour White
Size Full sized

entry.title: 09730 - NOIR Touchless Mechanical Roll Towel Dispenser
entry.summary:
Vendor: KRUGER
Type: Dispenser
Price: 99.00

Equip washrooms and keep maintenance to a minimum with the Kruger Noir Touchless Mechanical Roll Towel Dispenser. The wall-mountable dispenser features touchless operation to help prevent the spread of germs. It's simple to load for quick and easy service checks and compatible with long roll towels, so you can go longer between refills. The durable roll towel dispenser features a sleek design and smoke/black colour that enhances your facility's image. This unit is ADA Compliant and suitable for use in HACCP-compliant environments.

  • Touchless operation avoids spread of germs
  • Sleek, European design
  • ADA Compliant
  • Can be used in HACCP-compliant environments
  • Compatible with Kruger Embassy Long Roll Towels, 6-Pack (Item # 660632, sold separately)
  • Smoke/Black colour
  • Dimensions: 14.8" H. x 13.6" W. x 9.4" D.
  • Product Weight: 9 lb.
Colour  Black
